title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A story of racial injustice and the loss of innocence.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel about societal expectations.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A tale of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

title: Moby-Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge.

title: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
description: A historical novel about the Napoleonic Wars.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story of teenage rebellion and alienation.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A futuristic novel about a controlled society.

title: Jane Eyre
author: Charlotte Brontë
description: A gothic romance about an orphaned governess.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure about a hobbit’s journey.
